verses.verse: And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> of <S%H5514>Sinai<s%>, in the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation<s%>, on the <S%H259>first<s%> day of the <S%H8145>second<s%> <S%H2320>month<s%>, in the <S%H8145>second<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> after they were come <S%H3318>out<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

<S%H5375>Take<s%> the <S%H7218>sum<s%> of all the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, after their <S%H4940>families<s%>, by the <S%H1004>house<s%> of their <S%H1>fathers<s%>, with the <S%H4557>number<s%> of their <S%H8034>names<s%>, every <S%H2145>male<s%> by their <S%H1538>polls<s%>;

From <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> and <S%H4605>upward<s%>, all that are able to go <S%H3318>forth<s%> to <S%H6635>war<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel<s%>: you and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> shall <S%H6485>number<s%> them by their <S%H6635>armies<s%>.
And with you there shall be a <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H376>every<s%> <S%H4294>tribe<s%>; every <S%H376>one<s%> <S%H7218>head<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of his <S%H1>fathers<s%>.

and these are the <S%H8034>names<s%> of the <S%H582>men<s%> that shall <S%H5975>stand<s%> with <S%H7205>you<s%>: of the tribe of Reuben; <S%H468>Elizur<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7707>Shedeur<s%>.
Of <S%H8095>Simeon<s%>; <S%H8017>Shelumiel<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6701>Zurishaddai<s%>.
Of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>; <S%H5177>Nahshon<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5992>Amminadab<s%>.
Of <S%H3485>Issachar<s%>; <S%H5417>Nethaneel<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6686>Zuar<s%>.
Of <S%H2074>Zebulun<s%>; <S%H446>Eliab<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2497>Helon<s%>.

Of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3130>Joseph<s%>: of <S%H669>Ephraim<s%>; <S%H476>Elishama<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5989>Ammihud<s%>: of <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%>; <S%H1583>Gamaliel<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6301>Pedahzur<s%>.
Of <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%>; <S%H27>Abidan<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1441>Gideoni<s%>.
Of <S%H1835>Dan<s%>; <S%H295>Ahiezer<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5996>Ammishaddai<s%>.
Of <S%H836>Asher<s%>; <S%H6295>Pagiel<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5918>Ocran<s%>.
Of <S%H1410>Gad<s%>; <S%H460>Eliasaph<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1845>Deuel<s%>.
Of <S%H5321>Naphtali<s%>; <S%H299>Ahira<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5881>Enan<s%>.

These <S%H7148>were<s%> the <S%H7121>renowned<s%> of the <S%H5712>congregation<s%>, <S%H5387>princes<s%> of the <S%H4294>tribes<s%> of their <S%H1>fathers<s%>, <S%H7218>heads<s%> of <S%H505>thousands<s%> <S%H1992>in<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.
And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> these <S%H582>men<s%> which are <S%H5344>expressed<s%> by their <S%H8034>names<s%>:

And they <S%H6950>assembled<s%> all the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> <S%H6950>together<s%> on the <S%H259>first<s%> day of the <S%H8145>second<s%> <S%H2320>month<s%>, and they declared their <S%H3205>pedigrees<s%> after their <S%H4940>families<s%>, by the <S%H1004>house<s%> of their <S%H1>fathers<s%>, according to the <S%H4557>number<s%> of the <S%H8034>names<s%>, from <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> and <S%H4605>upward<s%>, by their <S%H1538>polls<s%>.
As the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, so he <S%H6485>numbered<s%> them in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> of <S%H5514>Sinai<s%>.

And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H7205>Reuben<s%>, <S%H3478>Israel<s%>'s oldest <S%H1060>son<s%>, by their <S%H8435>generations<s%>, after their <S%H4940>families<s%>, by the <S%H1004>house<s%> of their <S%H1>fathers<s%>, according to the <S%H4557>number<s%> of the <S%H8034>names<s%>, by their <S%H1538>polls<s%>, every <S%H2145>male<s%> from <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> and <S%H4605>upward<s%>, all that were able to go <S%H3318>forth<s%> to <S%H6635>war<s%>;

Those that were <S%H6485>numbered<s%> of <S%H4294>them<s%>, even of the tribe of <S%H7205>Reuben<s%>, were <S%H705>forty<s%> and <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> and <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%>.

Of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H8095>Simeon<s%>, by their <S%H8435>generations<s%>, after their <S%H4940>families<s%>, by the <S%H1004>house<s%> of their <S%H1>fathers<s%>, those that were <S%H6485>numbered<s%> of <S%H4557>them<s%>, according to the number of the <S%H8034>names<s%>, by their <S%H1538>polls<s%>, every <S%H2145>male<s%> from <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> and <S%H4605>upward<s%>, all that were able to go <S%H3318>forth<s%> to <S%H6635>war<s%>;

Those that were <S%H6485>numbered<s%> of <S%H4294>them<s%>, even of the tribe of <S%H8095>Simeon<s%>, were <S%H2572>fifty<s%> and <S%H8672>nine<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> and <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%>.

Of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1410>Gad<s%>, by their <S%H8435>generations<s%>, after their <S%H4940>families<s%>, by the <S%H1004>house<s%> of their <S%H1>fathers<s%>, according to the <S%H4557>number<s%> of the <S%H8034>names<s%>, from <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> and <S%H4605>upward<s%>, all that were able to go <S%H3318>forth<s%> to <S%H6635>war<s%>;

Those that were <S%H6485>numbered<s%> of <S%H4294>them<s%>, even of the tribe of <S%H1410>Gad<s%>, were <S%H705>forty<s%> and <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H2572>fifty<s%>.

Of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, by their <S%H8435>generations<s%>, after their <S%H4940>families<s%>, by the <S%H1004>house<s%> of their <S%H1>fathers<s%>, according to the <S%H4557>number<s%> of the <S%H8034>names<s%>, from <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> and <S%H4605>upward<s%>, all that were able to go <S%H3318>forth<s%> to <S%H6635>war<s%>;

Those that were <S%H6485>numbered<s%> of <S%H4294>them<s%>, even of the tribe of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, were <S%H7657>sixty<s%> and <S%H702>fourteen<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> and <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%>.

Of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3485>Issachar<s%>, by their <S%H8435>generations<s%>, after their <S%H4940>families<s%>, by the <S%H1004>house<s%> of their <S%H1>fathers<s%>, according to the <S%H4557>number<s%> of the <S%H8034>names<s%>, from <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> and <S%H4605>upward<s%>, all that were able to go <S%H3318>forth<s%> to <S%H6635>war<s%>;

Those that were <S%H6485>numbered<s%> of <S%H4294>them<s%>, even of the tribe of <S%H3485>Issachar<s%>, were <S%H2572>fifty<s%> and <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> and <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%>.

Of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H2074>Zebulun<s%>, by their <S%H8435>generations<s%>, after their <S%H4940>families<s%>, by the <S%H1004>house<s%> of their <S%H1>fathers<s%>, according to the <S%H4557>number<s%> of the <S%H8034>names<s%>, from <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> and <S%H4605>upward<s%>, all that were able to go <S%H3318>forth<s%> to <S%H6635>war<s%>;

Those that were <S%H6485>numbered<s%> of <S%H4294>them<s%>, even of the tribe of <S%H2074>Zebulun<s%>, were <S%H2572>fifty<s%> and <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> and <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%>.

Of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3130>Joseph<s%>, <S%H1121>namely<s%>, of the sons of <S%H669>Ephraim<s%>, by their <S%H8435>generations<s%>, after their <S%H4940>families<s%>, by the <S%H1004>house<s%> of their <S%H1>fathers<s%>, according to the <S%H4557>number<s%> of the <S%H8034>names<s%>, from <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> and <S%H4605>upward<s%>, all that were able to go <S%H3318>forth<s%> to <S%H6635>war<s%>;
Those that were <S%H6485>numbered<s%> of <S%H4294>them<s%>, even of the tribe of <S%H669>Ephraim<s%>, were <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> and <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%>.

Of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%>, by their <S%H8435>generations<s%>, after their <S%H4940>families<s%>, by the <S%H1004>house<s%> of their <S%H1>fathers<s%>, according to the <S%H4557>number<s%> of the <S%H8034>names<s%>, from <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> and <S%H4605>upward<s%>, all that were able to go <S%H3318>forth<s%> to <S%H6635>war<s%>;

Those that were <S%H6485>numbered<s%> of <S%H4294>them<s%>, even of the tribe of <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%>, were <S%H7970>thirty<s%> and <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> and two <S%H3967>hundred<s%>.

Of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%>, by their <S%H8435>generations<s%>, after their <S%H4940>families<s%>, by the <S%H1004>house<s%> of their <S%H1>fathers<s%>, according to the <S%H4557>number<s%> of the <S%H8034>names<s%>, from <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> and <S%H4605>upward<s%>, all that were able to go <S%H3318>forth<s%> to <S%H6635>war<s%>;

Those that were <S%H6485>numbered<s%> of <S%H4294>them<s%>, even of the tribe of <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%>, were <S%H7970>thirty<s%> and <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> and <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%>.

Of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1835>Dan<s%>, by their <S%H8435>generations<s%>, after their <S%H4940>families<s%>, by the <S%H1004>house<s%> of their <S%H1>fathers<s%>, according to the <S%H4557>number<s%> of the <S%H8034>names<s%>, from <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> and <S%H4605>upward<s%>, all that were able to go <S%H3318>forth<s%> to <S%H6635>war<s%>;

Those that were <S%H6485>numbered<s%> of <S%H4294>them<s%>, even of the tribe of <S%H1835>Dan<s%>, were <S%H8346>sixty<s%> and <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> and <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%>.

Of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H836>Asher<s%>, by their <S%H8435>generations<s%>, after their <S%H4940>families<s%>, by the <S%H1004>house<s%> of their <S%H1>fathers<s%>, according to the <S%H4557>number<s%> of the <S%H8034>names<s%>, from <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> and <S%H4605>upward<s%>, all that were able to go <S%H3318>forth<s%> to <S%H6635>war<s%>;

Those that were <S%H6485>numbered<s%> of <S%H4294>them<s%>, even of the tribe of <S%H836>Asher<s%>, were <S%H705>forty<s%> and <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> and <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%>.

Of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H5321>Naphtali<s%>, throughout their <S%H8435>generations<s%>, after their <S%H4940>families<s%>, by the <S%H1004>house<s%> of their <S%H1>fathers<s%>, according to the <S%H4557>number<s%> of the <S%H8034>names<s%>, from <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> and <S%H4605>upward<s%>, all that were able to go <S%H3318>forth<s%> to <S%H6635>war<s%>;

Those that were <S%H6485>numbered<s%> of <S%H4294>them<s%>, even of the tribe of <S%H5321>Naphtali<s%>, were <S%H2572>fifty<s%> and <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> and <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%>.

These are those that were <S%H6485>numbered<s%>, which <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> <S%H6485>numbered<s%>, and the <S%H5387>princes<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, being <S%H6240>twelve<s%> <S%H376>men<s%>: <S%H376>each<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> was for the <S%H1004>house<s%> of his <S%H1>fathers<s%>.

So were all those that were <S%H6485>numbered<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, by the <S%H1004>house<s%> of their <S%H1>fathers<s%>, from <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> and <S%H4605>upward<s%>, all that were able to go <S%H3318>forth<s%> to <S%H6635>war<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel<s%>;

Even all they that were <S%H6485>numbered<s%> were <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> and <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> and <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H2572>fifty<s%>.
But the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> after the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of their <S%H1>fathers<s%> were not <S%H6485>numbered<s%> among <S%H8432>them<s%>.
For the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> had <S%H1696>spoken<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

Only you shall not <S%H6485>number<s%> the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H3878>Levi<s%>, neither <S%H5375>take<s%> the <S%H7218>sum<s%> of them <S%H8432>among<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>:

But you shall <S%H6485>appoint<s%> the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> over the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> of <S%H5715>testimony<s%>, and over all the <S%H3627>vessels<s%> <S%H5375>there<s%>, and over all things that belong to it: they shall carry the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%>, and all the <S%H3627>vessels<s%> <S%H8334>there<s%>; and they shall minister unto <S%H2583>it<s%>, and shall encamp round <S%H5439>about<s%> the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%>.

And when the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> sets <S%H5265>forward<s%>, the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> shall take it <S%H3381>down<s%>: and when the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> is to be <S%H2583>pitched<s%>, the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> shall set it <S%H6965>up<s%>: and the <S%H2114>stranger<s%> that comes <S%H7131>near<s%> shall be put to <S%H4191>death<s%>.

And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> shall pitch their <S%H2583>tents<s%>, every <S%H376>man<s%> by his own <S%H4264>camp<s%>, and every <S%H376>man<s%> by his own <S%H1714>standard<s%>, throughout their <S%H6635>hosts<s%>.

But the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> shall <S%H2583>pitch<s%> round <S%H5439>about<s%> the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> of <S%H5715>testimony<s%>, that there be no <S%H7110>wrath<s%> upon the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>: and the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> shall <S%H8104>keep<s%> the <S%H4931>charge<s%> of the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> of <S%H5715>testimony<s%>.
And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> according to all that the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, so did <S%H6213>they<s%>.
